title: Bug 117981 - Unable to select any item at first attempt in library outline view
description:
Description: When attempting to select an item in the library outline view, the item cannot be selected on the first try. Instead, the focus jumps to the library file node in the outline view.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select any item.

Observed Behavior: The item cannot be selected on the first attempt.

Expected Behavior: The item should be selectable when clicked on.
